name: Bowman (Saksham Shah)
description:
Use your bow to shoot the rocks onto buttons and solve puzzles!

Controls
  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to aim
  • Hold left click to draw your bow and release to fire an arrow
    • Hold for longer to make your arrow go faster and further!
  • Right click to pick up a nearby object
    • Click again to place it
Features
  • 25 levels - Hours of gameplay!
    • The levels consist of many unique gameplay mechanics leading to very interesting and challenging puzzles.
  • The levels start off easy and get harder, challenge yourself as far as you want.
  • Star system - complete levels with fewer arrows to gain more stars which unlock more levels!
    • Choose how hard you want to make the puzzles for yourself - you can use many arrows and be satisfied with one star, or you can go for perfection and try to use as few arrows as possible!
Tools used

p5.js with p5ui.js
Musescore (music by Saksham Shah)
freesound.org for some of the sound effects

beepbox.co for some of the sound effects

Created in 2 weeks by Saksham Shah for the Unexpected Jam 2020
